Installation

ParamBSpline2 is an ANSI standard REXX program. You must have a REXX interpreter on your system. There are free and/or commercial interpreters for all operating systems a general user such as yourself is likely to use, including super computers.

If you already have REXX you place the program, ParamBSpline2.cmd where ever you like, usually in your path, and away you go. Complex, right?

If you are running under MicroSoft you may wish to change the program's name to ParamBSpline2.rex MicroSoft typically has the extension ".cmd" reserved for other purposes.
